greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular table read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of binary bisymmetric n X n matrices with exactly k 1's; n>=0, 0<=k<=n^2.
comment: T(n,k) = 0 if n is even and k is odd.
T(n,k) = T(n,k+1) if n is odd and k is even.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..32, flattened
Dennis P. Walsh, Notes on binary bisymmetric matrices
formula: G.f. for row n: (1+x)^t*(1+x^2)^(n-t)*(1+x^4)^(((n-2)*n+t)/4) where t = n mod 2. - _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 27 2015
results.author: _Kival Ngaokrajang_, Sep 26 2015
ext: More terms from _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 27 2015
